MESSAGE.JP: が覚める。
理樹@「ふあぁぁぁ…」
曜日の朝はきついなぁ…。
っさと身支度を整え、学食に向かうことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I quickly got changed and left for the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: I quickly got changed and left for the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日も、一日が始まる。
つものように昇降口を抜け、下駄箱へ。
MESSAGE.EN: I arrived at my shoe locker.
MESSAGE.Translation: I arrived at my shoe locker.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれ…」
分の下駄箱のドアを開け、すぐに違和感に気付く。
MESSAGE.EN: As I opened it, I noticed at once that something was wrong.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I opened it, I noticed at once that something was wrong.

MESSAGE.JP: 上履きの中に何か光るものがいくつか入っている。
MESSAGE.EN: ...There were shining things in my shoes.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There were shining things in my shoes.

MESSAGE.JP: とつ取り出してみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I picked one of them up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I picked one of them up.

MESSAGE.JP: 鋲だ。
理樹@「これって…」
ジメ…？
理樹@（誰かが冗談でやったとかじゃないよね…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I don't think this can be any kind of a joke...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I don't think this can be any kind of a joke...)

MESSAGE.JP: りにこういうことを冗談ででもやりそうな人はいない。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure that anyone close to me wouldn't do something like this even as a jest.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure that anyone close to me wouldn't do something like this even as a jest.

MESSAGE.JP: てことは、これは確実に第三者が僕をターゲットにしたものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words, this has been done by somebody I'm not familiar with.
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words, this has been done by somebody I'm not familiar with.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「どうした、理樹？」
理樹@「いや、うん」
来ヶ谷@「やあ、少年」
吾に画鋲を見せようとした瞬間、後ろから声を掛けられる。
MESSAGE.EN: When I was about to show the thumbtacks to Kengo, somebody spoke up to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I was about to show the thumbtacks to Kengo, somebody spoke up to me.

MESSAGE.JP: は反射的に画鋲を隠した。
MESSAGE.EN: And then I hid them reflexively.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then I hid them reflexively.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あ、ああ…来ヶ谷さんか」
謙吾@「…よう」
来ヶ谷@「うむ、ふたりとも息災で何よりだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, I'm happy to find you two well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, I'm happy to find you two well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「しかし理樹君、何をそんなに驚くことがある。私がここにいることがそんなに意外か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But Riki-kun, why are you so surprised? Is it so surprising to see me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But Riki-kun, why are you so surprised? Is it so surprising to see me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「…それとも私に何か隠し事でもあるのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Or are you by chance hiding something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Or are you by chance hiding something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 不敵な笑み。
理樹@「いや、多分そういうんじゃないと思う」
来ヶ谷@「ふむ。全く少年の心は解し難い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm, it's rather hard to understand the thoughts of a young man.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm, it's rather hard to understand the thoughts of a young man.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ういえば、これ、来ヶ谷さんの時と同じ手口だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Come to think of it... this is the same tactic that was employed against Kurugaya-san earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: Come to think of it... this is the same tactic that was employed against Kurugaya-san earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…来ヶ谷さん」
来ヶ谷@「ん、どうした」
理樹@「あの、こないだの画鋲とかの嫌がらせだけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, weren't you harassed with thumbtacks the other day?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, weren't you harassed with thumbtacks the other day?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「あぁ…あれか」
来ヶ谷@「見事にぱったりと止んだな。私に嫌がらせをしても無駄だと気付いたらしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝They splendidly stopped. Seems like they learned the lesson that there's no point in trying to attack me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝They splendidly stopped. Seems like they learned the lesson that there's no point in trying to attack me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「リスクを負うことに気付く程度の知能はあったんだろうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝At least even they are smart enough to evaluate the risks of targeting me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝At least even they are smart enough to evaluate the risks of targeting me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そっか…」
ヶ谷さんの下駄箱からは思いっきり離れているし、何かの間違いってこともなさそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: My shoe locker is far from hers, so I don't think they could've made a mistake.
MESSAGE.Translation: My shoe locker is far from hers, so I don't think they could've made a mistake.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…恨みを買うようなことしたかな）
んか、無駄に気が重い…。
MESSAGE.EN: It gives me a heavy feeling...
MESSAGE.Translation: It gives me a heavy feeling...

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そろそろ行くぞ理樹。また鈴が朝からでかい声で騒ぎ立てるからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝We have to go, Riki. Or Rin's gonna shout at us and make a fuss again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝We have to go, Riki. Or Rin's gonna shout at us and make a fuss again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ああ、うん」
来ヶ谷@「ではおねーさんもゆるりと教室に向かうとしよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well then, I suppose Onee-san will have to make her way there also.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well then, I suppose Onee-san will have to make her way there also.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷@「うむうむ、枯れ木も山の賑わいというやつだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, umu, even a rotten tree helps the forest flourish.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, umu, even a rotten tree helps the forest flourish.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 誰を指して枯れ木、といってるんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...A rotten tree... who is she referring to...?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...A rotten tree... who is she referring to...?

MESSAGE.JP: 室に着くと、前に来ヶ谷さんに手渡された画鋲を取り出してみる。
MESSAGE.EN: When we arrived in the classroom, I took out the thumbtack that Kurugaya-san had handed over to me before.
MESSAGE.Translation: When we arrived in the classroom, I took out the thumbtack that Kurugaya-san had handed over to me before.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やっぱり同じのだ…」
あ、とため息を吐く。
機は良くわからないが、こういうことをしそうな人間というのは、来ヶ谷さんを狙っていた連中しか思い浮かばなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Those girls that did it to Kurugaya-san seem to be the only suspects, even though I don't know why they would be focusing on me now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those girls that did it to Kurugaya-san seem to be the only suspects, even though I don't know why they would be focusing on me now.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「何だ理樹、暗い顔しやがって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's wrong with you, Riki, making such a gloomy face?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's wrong with you, Riki, making such a gloomy face?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あぁ…」
理樹@「なんか覚えのないことで悪意を向けられると、結構きついなぁって思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's kind of painful to know there's somebody harboring ill feelings toward me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's kind of painful to know there's somebody harboring ill feelings toward me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「はぁ？」
いったところで、朝のＨＲが始まる。
MESSAGE.EN: Right then, the morning homeroom started.
MESSAGE.Translation: Right then, the morning homeroom started.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、気にしないでいいよ」
得の行っていない表情の真人を横に、正面に向き直る。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato didn't seem happy with my answer, but I turned to face the blackboard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato didn't seem happy with my answer, but I turned to face the blackboard.

MESSAGE.JP: 害ないはずなのに、やっぱりへこむなぁ、これ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though there's been no harm yet, this does make me feel down...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though there's been no harm yet, this does make me feel down...

MESSAGE.JP: Ｒが終わる。
に教科書を入れていると、小毬さんと鈴の会話が聞こえてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I put my textbook in my bag, I overheard Komari-san and Rin talking.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I put my textbook in my bag, I overheard Komari-san and Rin talking.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「買い出し？　ひょっとしてモンペチかなぁ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Buy in bulk? Are you by any chance talking about Mon Petit?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Buy in bulk? Are you by any chance talking about Mon Petit?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「そう。モンペチ。たくさん買わないといけない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah. Mon Petit. I need to buy a lot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah. Mon Petit. I need to buy a lot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「近くの店で特売日があるんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝A nearby store is having a special bargain...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝A nearby store is having a special bargain...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「だから、その、うー」
小毬@「うん、おっけーだよー。どれぐらい買うの？」
鈴@「えっと、これぐらいだ」
は両手をあげた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin put both her hands up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin put both her hands up.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ふえぇっ。それは大変だねえ…」
小毬@「でもきっとだいじょうぶっ」
小毬@「なんとかなるよー」
た大量に買うんだろうなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: They seem to be buying a large amount again.
MESSAGE.Translation: They seem to be buying a large amount again.

MESSAGE.JP: 手はあったほうがいいだろうな。真人とかならたくさん運べるだろうし。
MESSAGE.EN: The more people the better. If I can get someone like Masato to come, we could carry a lot.
MESSAGE.Translation: The more people the better. If I can get someone like Masato to come, we could carry a lot.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人ー…って、あれ？」
理樹@「いないや…」
？　携帯にメールが届いた。見てみる。
MESSAGE.EN: Hm? I got a text and opened it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hm? I got a text and opened it.

MESSAGE.JP: わりぃ理樹。恭介に呼び出された』
ぇー。ひどいよ。声掛けてくれればいいのにー。
MESSAGE.EN: Eh. So mean. I wish he'd said something to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Eh. So mean. I wish he'd said something to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 寂しいだろうががまんしてくれ！』
MESSAGE.EN: [You're probably lonely, but hang in there!]
MESSAGE.Translation: [You're probably lonely, but hang in there!]

MESSAGE.JP: 人…。うん、僕がまんするよ。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato... okay, I'll hang in there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato... okay, I'll hang in there.

MESSAGE.JP: がまんできなかったらプロテインやるから。机ん中な！』
MESSAGE.EN: [If you can't hang in there, have some protein. It's in my desk!]
MESSAGE.Translation: [If you can't hang in there, have some protein. It's in my desk!]

MESSAGE.JP: らないから。
理樹@「…鈴、小毬さん」
だけでも手伝えばいいか。二人に声をかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I should help even if it's just me, so I called out to them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should help even if it's just me, so I called out to them.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ん、どうした理樹」
鈴@「馬鹿と遊びに行かないのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Aren't you going to go play with that idiot?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Aren't you going to go play with that idiot?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「今日はなし、みたい。恭介と用事があるんだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Not today, I guess. He's doing something with Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Not today, I guess. He's doing something with Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ふーん…そっか」
鈴@「…最近何調べてるんだ、馬鹿兄貴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...He's been looking into something recently. That stupid brother.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...He's been looking into something recently. That stupid brother.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うーみゅ。まぁいい。どうせくだらないことだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Umyu. Whatever. I'm sure it's something pointless.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Umyu. Whatever. I'm sure it's something pointless.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「モンペチを買いに行こう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝We're going to go buy Mon Petit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝We're going to go buy Mon Petit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、聞こえてたよ。荷物持ちが必要だよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I heard. You need someone to carry it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I heard. You need someone to carry it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「理樹君、手伝ってくれるの？　ありがとー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, are you going to help? Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Riki-kun, are you going to help? Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうせ暇だからいいよ」
理樹@「じゃ、行くときは声掛けてね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, I'll tell you when we leave.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, I'll tell you when we leave.❞

MESSAGE.JP: というところで、ちょうどチャイムが鳴った。
っかく仲良くなったふたりが行く買い物だ。
MESSAGE.EN: These two, who have finally become great friends, are going shopping together.
MESSAGE.Translation: These two, who have finally become great friends, are going shopping together.

MESSAGE.JP: がついていって邪魔をしても悪い気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I feel like I'd be getting in the way if I went.
MESSAGE.Translation: I feel like I'd be getting in the way if I went.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「じゃあ私がんばるよー」
鈴@「うん、こまりちゃんだけが頼りだ」
小毬@「任せてくださいなー」
いや、不安だけど。
昼休みになる。
今日はどうしようか。
今日はどうしようか。
食に行こう。
MESSAGE.EN: All right, I'm going to the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: All right, I'm going to the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: のことについて、相談もしたいし。
MESSAGE.EN: I want to talk to somebody about what happened this morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: I want to talk to somebody about what happened this morning.

MESSAGE.JP: ふと、視界の端に、教室を出て行くクドと葉留佳さんが映った。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I saw Kud and Haruka-san leave the classroom together.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I saw Kud and Haruka-san leave the classroom together.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「早く学食行こうぜ、理樹」
人がいつものように声をかけてきた。
うしよう？
とまず学食に行こう。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, let's go to the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, let's go to the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「謙吾もいいかな」
謙吾@「ん、かまわんが」
あ、朝のことは後で来ヶ谷さんに直接相談すればいいか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, I think I'm going to talk to Kurugaya-san later about what happened this morning...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, I think I'm going to talk to Kurugaya-san later about what happened this morning...

MESSAGE.JP: とまず学食に行こう。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, I'm going to the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, I'm going to the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「謙吾もいいかな」
謙吾@「ん、かまわんが」
理樹@「…行こうか、真人」
に興味も引かれず、真人と一緒に昼食をとることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no particular business with them, so I left for the cafeteria with him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no particular business with them, so I left for the cafeteria with him.

MESSAGE.JP: み時間。
販機からの帰り道。
MESSAGE.EN: On the way back from the vending machine.
MESSAGE.Translation: On the way back from the vending machine.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれ…」
庭でストレルカの姿を見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: I found Strelka in the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: I found Strelka in the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「どうしたの、ストレルカ」
ストレルカ@「オンッ!!」
ちらを見てひとつ吠えるが、そのまま走っていってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: The dog looked at me, gave a bark and ran away.
MESSAGE.Translation: The dog looked at me, gave a bark and ran away.

MESSAGE.JP: ストレルカがあんなふうに、落ち着きなく走り回ってるのも珍しい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It's very unusual that she's running around restlessly like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It's very unusual that she's running around restlessly like that.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（何かあったのかなぁ）
の後を追いかけることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to follow after her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to follow after her.

MESSAGE.JP: 、速いなぁ…。
理樹@「えーと…」
りを見渡す。
ストレルカといっしょに、クドの姿も見つけた。
クド@「ストレルカ、どうでしたか」
ストレルカ@
クゥーン…」
クド@「…そうですかー…どうしたのでしょうか…」
っぱり何かあったみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Sounds like something is going on.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sounds like something is going on.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「クド」
クド@「あっ、リキ…」
クド@「ヴェルカの姿を見ませんでしたかっ」
理樹@「ヴェルカ？」
クド@「朝から姿を見ないのです…とても心配です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I haven't seen her since this morning... It really worries me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I haven't seen her since this morning... It really worries me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: トレルカもくぅん、と声を上げる。
たしか、ヴェルカはストレルカの相棒だ。
クド@「学校から出てはいないと思うのですが、どこにもいないのです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I don't think she's left the school grounds, but there's no sign of her anywhere...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I don't think she's left the school grounds, but there's no sign of her anywhere...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なるほど…」
クド@「どうしましょう～」
理樹@「あーうん、僕も探してあげるからさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Er, okay, I'll help you find her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Er, okay, I'll help you find her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「大丈夫、すぐ見つかるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's gonna be all right. We'll find her in no time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's gonna be all right. We'll find her in no time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「お、おねがいします～」
理樹@「何か心当たりはない？」
クド@「校舎の中には入らないよう躾られているので、外のどこかだと思うのですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝She's trained not to go in the school building, so somewhere outside...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝She's trained not to go in the school building, so somewhere outside...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「了解。じゃあ、連絡は携帯でね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Got it. If you find anything, let me know with your cellphone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Got it. If you find anything, let me know with your cellphone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はいっ」
ン、とクドの傍らのストレルカも答える。
というわけで、ヴェルカを探して歩き回ることに。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That said, I started searching for Belka.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That said, I started searching for Belka.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ヴェルカ～」
え込みの影なんかの、隠れられそうな場所にも注意して探し回る。
MESSAGE.EN: I carefully checked out the places where he could be hiding, one after another.
MESSAGE.Translation: I carefully checked out the places where he could be hiding, one after another.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いないか…」
の辺りにはいないのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess she's not around here.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess she's not around here.

MESSAGE.JP: り廊下に差し掛かる。
鈴@「よしよしよし」
猫@「むにゃ～」
相変らず鈴が猫と戯れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...As always, Rin was there playing with her cats.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...As always, Rin was there playing with her cats.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「鈴」
鈴@「ん」
鈴@「なんだ」
理樹@「ヴェルカを見なかった？」
鈴@「べるか？」
理樹@「えーと、これくらいの黒い犬なんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Er, a black dog. She's this big.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Er, a black dog. She's this big.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「見てないな」
理樹@「うーん…」
っちの方じゃないってことだろうか。
小毬@「にゃ～にゃ～」
小毬@「$K42かにかま$K0持って来たよ～」
語（？）をしゃべりながら、とてとてと小毬さんが走ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Speaking the cat language(?), Komari-san ran up to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Speaking the cat language(?), Komari-san ran up to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「あ、理樹君」
小毬@「こんにちは～」
理樹@「あ、うん…小毬さんもヴェルカ見なかった？」
小毬@「ふえ？　うーん、私は見てないなぁ…」
理樹@「そっか…」
小毬@「なにかあったの？」
理樹@「実は…」
通り話し終える。
小毬@「うん、わかった、私も探すよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Okay, got it. I'll look for her, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Okay, got it. I'll look for her, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「手伝う」
理樹@「ごめん、ありがと」
小毬@「あっ」
小毬@「くろいしっぽはっけんっ」
理樹@「え、いきなり？」
鈴@「いや、そいつは…」
小毬@「わんわんっ」
犬語（？）を喋りながらそっちの方に走っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Speaking the dog language(?), Komari-san closed in on the tail.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Speaking the dog language(?), Komari-san closed in on the tail.

MESSAGE.JP: 猫@「にゃぎゃああああーーーーーっ!!」
小毬@「ひゃあああああーーーーーっ!?」
小毬さん、猫に追いかけられて戦線離脱。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She ran away with a cat in hot pursuit.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She ran away with a cat in hot pursuit.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あいつは凶暴で犬嫌いなんだ…」
理樹@「いやまあ…」
索開始から、しばらくして。
理樹@「中庭はたぶん全部見たけど、ダメだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I searched the entire courtyard, but couldn't find her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I searched the entire courtyard, but couldn't find her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「グラウンドの方もダメでした…」
鈴@「校門のほうはダメだった」
小毬@「私はどこも回れてないけどダメだった～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I was no good, I couldn't look anywhere～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I was no good, I couldn't look anywhere～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんはボロボロになっていた。
理樹@「じゃあ、寮の方かも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We didn't check at the dorms yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We didn't check at the dorms yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はいっ、いってみましょうっ」
小毬@「私は他のみんなにも声掛けて、もっといろいろ探してみるよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'll go tell more people to help us out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'll go tell more people to help us out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「はい、申し訳ないです…」
小毬@「ぜんぜんおっけーだよ～」
毬さんと別れ、体育館側から学食の裏を抜ける。
MESSAGE.EN: After having parted company with Komari-san, we headed for the dorm section.
MESSAGE.Translation: After having parted company with Komari-san, we headed for the dorm section.

MESSAGE.JP: 鳴き声@「きゃんきゃんっ!!」
声@「よしよし、わんわんわん♪」
鳴き声と女の子の声が聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...We heard an animal's voice, and that of a girl.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...We heard an animal's voice, and that of a girl.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれは…」
クド@「ヴェルカの声ですっ」
ヴェルカ@「ヴァゥ～!!」
佐々美@「うふふ、くすぐったいですわよ」
佐々美@「そんなに指を舐めても何も出ないですわよ、わんわん♪」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Even if you lick my finger, I'm not giving you anything, wan wan♪❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Even if you lick my finger, I'm not giving you anything, wan wan♪❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瀬川さんが、とても乙女チックにヴェルカと戯れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san was playing with Belka in a most girlish fashion.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san was playing with Belka in a most girlish fashion.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「はっ!?」
っちに気付くと。
そのまま数秒、動きが止まる。
鈴@「…なにやってるんだ」
佐々美@「こっ、こ、これは、その…」
鈴@「おまえがヴェルカ誘拐の首謀者か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Are you the one who kidnapped Belka?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Are you the one who kidnapped Belka?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ゆ、誘拐!?」
クド@「ゆーかい、という場面には見えませんねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It doesn't look like she was kidnapped...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It doesn't look like she was kidnapped...❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「犬好きに悪いひとはいませんっ！」
ドはきっぱり言い切った。
クド@「勿論猫好きも悪い人はいませんっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Of course, all cat lovers are also good people!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Of course, all cat lovers are also good people!❞

MESSAGE.JP: のほうをみてクドは付け加える。
MESSAGE.EN: She added the last clause after a glance at Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: She added the last clause after a glance at Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「つまりヴェルカと仲良しないいひと発見！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That means we've found a good person who's friends with Belka!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That means we've found a good person who's friends with Belka!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「い、いえ…仲良しって…」
鈴@「確かに…めちゃくちゃデレデレしてたな」
理樹@「笹瀬川さんって犬好きなんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I didn't know you like dogs, Sasasegawa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I didn't know you like dogs, Sasasegawa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぬほど恥ずかしそうだった。
佐々美@「ふ、フン…そこのゴミ入れからうるさい声が上がってたから、外に出してみただけですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Hu... Hmph, I just noticed her making a ruckus inside that trash bin, so I took him out for some peace and quiet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Hu... Hmph, I just noticed her making a ruckus inside that trash bin, so I took him out for some peace and quiet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「そうだったのですか…」
クド@「ともかく、ヴェルカを助けていただきありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Anyway, thank you very much for helping her out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Anyway, thank you very much for helping her out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ェルカもワゥ～、と尻尾を振りながら声を上げる。
クド@「ヴェルカもありがとうと言っていますっ」
佐々美@「別に…そんなつもりじゃないですわ」
ヴェルカ@「きゃんきゃんっ」
瀬川さんの足にヴェルカがじゃれ付く。すっかり懐いてるみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Belka still wouldn't leave Sasami alone. It seems that she really likes her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Belka still wouldn't leave Sasami alone. It seems that she really likes her.

MESSAGE.JP: 面の笑みでしゃがみこんで、その相手をはじめた。
MESSAGE.EN: With a big grin, Sasami bent down and began playing with her again.
MESSAGE.Translation: With a big grin, Sasami bent down and began playing with her again.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「めちゃくちゃデレデレしてるな」
佐々美@「はっ!?　ち、ちがいますわっ!!」
ストレルカ@「オンッ」
佐々美@「あ、あぁぅ…」
トレルカも笹瀬川さんに近づき、頬を舐めた。
クド@「ストレルカもありがとう、といっています」
クド@「私からもありがとうなのですっ」
佐々美@「ちょ、くすぐったいですわぁっ!!」
クド@「わふ～」
佐々美@「は、離れなさいってばっ!!」
匹…いや、二匹とひとりに囲まれ、笹瀬川さんは赤面しっぱなしだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was surrounded by three... I mean, two dogs, red to her ears.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was surrounded by three... I mean, two dogs, red to her ears.

MESSAGE.JP: なく、聞き込みを続けていた小毬さんからのメールが届いた。
MESSAGE.EN: A moment later I got an email from Komari-san, who had been trying to find out how Belka had disappeared.
MESSAGE.Translation: A moment later I got an email from Komari-san, who had been trying to find out how Belka had disappeared.

MESSAGE.JP: うやら用務員さんがゴミの整理をしているときに、ヴェルカが間違って中に入ってしまったようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems she had accidentally gotten into a trash can when the janitor was doing his rounds.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems she had accidentally gotten into a trash can when the janitor was doing his rounds.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「どうして気付かなかったの!?　あんなところに閉じ込められたら可哀想じゃありませんこと!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝How could you not notice!? She was so pitiful, trapped in there!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝How could you not notice!? She was so pitiful, trapped in there!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 用務員@「いやあ、面目ない…」
佐々美@「…今度から気をつけてくださる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Please make sure it will not happen again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Please make sure it will not happen again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: のすごい剣幕の笹瀬川さんに、用務員さんは終始圧倒されっぱなしだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was fuming mad, and the janitor didn't say anything but just kept apologizing.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was fuming mad, and the janitor didn't say anything but just kept apologizing.

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「笹瀬川さんはいいひとなのですね」
佐々美@「い、いいひとって…そ、そんなんじゃないですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝A nice person...? I don't think so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝A nice person...? I don't think so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: クド@「わふ～」
クドが笹瀬川さんに抱きつく。
佐々美@「ちょ、やめなさいっ！　重たいですわっ」
ストレルカ@「オンッ」
ヴェルカ@「ワゥ～」
れに感化されたのか、さらにヴェルカとストレルカも笹瀬川さんに飛びついた。
MESSAGE.EN: Emboldened by her example, Belka and Strelka also jumped on Sasasegawa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Emboldened by her example, Belka and Strelka also jumped on Sasasegawa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ひょっとして…笹瀬川さんってさ…」
鈴@「ノーコメントだ」
案外いい人なのかもしれないなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Maybe she's actually a really good girl.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Maybe she's actually a really good girl.

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「ああーもうっ!!　棗鈴!!　決着は次の機会につけますわっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ahhh, enough!! Rin Natsume!! We will settle it next time!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ahhh, enough!! Rin Natsume!! We will settle it next time!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「ん、よくわからんがわかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hm, I don't really get it but I've got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hm, I don't really get it but I've got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 佐々美@「覚えてらっしゃいっ!!」
り去っていった。
理樹@「なんか、難儀なひとだなぁ…」
室に戻り、小毬さんと合流する。
MESSAGE.EN: Upon returning to our classroom, we saw Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Upon returning to our classroom, we saw Komari-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「なんか、笹瀬川さんの意外な一面が見れた気がするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You know what, we saw a new side of Sasasegawa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You know what, we saw a new side of Sasasegawa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「さーちゃんはそういうのが苦手なだけだと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I guess she's just not good at expressing her true feelings.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I guess she's just not good at expressing her true feelings.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「うーん…」
鈴@「でも、つっかかって来てるのはいつもあいつだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But she's the one who's always picking a fight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But she's the one who's always picking a fight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「さーちゃんはきっとぶきよーなんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝She just doesn't know how to act in those situations.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝She just doesn't know how to act in those situations.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「本当はりんちゃんと友達になりたいんじゃないかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝She probably actually wants to be friends with you, Rin-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝She probably actually wants to be friends with you, Rin-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そういえば、小毬さんって笹瀬川さんと仲いいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝By the way, you two are friends?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝By the way, you two are friends?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、実はそうなんだよ」
実はも何も、前々からのふたりを見てるとそうとしか思えない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Her answer confirmed what I had already guessed from seeing the two together.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Her answer confirmed what I had already guessed from seeing the two together.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ごめんね、さーちゃん恥ずかしがり屋だから、人に話しちゃダメだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'm sorry I kept it secret. She told me not to mention it, since she's so shy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'm sorry I kept it secret. She told me not to mention it, since she's so shy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、ひょっとしてヒョードルのとき…」
小毬@「ふええっ」
小毬@「そ、それは言っちゃダメって言われてるんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝S-She didn't want to let anybody know about that, either...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝S-She didn't want to let anybody know about that, either...❞

MESSAGE.JP: もうそれだけで言ったも同然だった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Komari-san did basically tell us already, though.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Komari-san did basically tell us already, though.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「どういうことだ？」
理樹@「ヒョードルを診てたのは笹瀬川さんだった、ってことじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think Sasasegawa-san was taking care of Fyodor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think Sasasegawa-san was taking care of Fyodor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「ふえっ、なんでわかるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue, how did you figure it out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue, how did you figure it out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「こいつはたまに優秀だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He's smart every once in a while.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He's smart every once in a while.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「すごいねぇ…」
理樹@「いやまあ」
からないほうが珍しいと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: In my opinion, there were only a few people who wouldn't have figured it out.
MESSAGE.Translation: In my opinion, there were only a few people who wouldn't have figured it out.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「あいつが、か…」
鈴@「こんど、もうちょっと話してみる」
小毬@「うん、そうしてあげて～」
の中でも、笹瀬川さんの評価が少し変わったみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Sounds like Rin has begun to see Sasasegawa-san in a new light.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sounds like Rin has begun to see Sasasegawa-san in a new light.
